markdownRemark.html:
These visualizations are based on data from d3.ru, an online platform based on a rating system that allows users to appraise other individual users as well as content entries and comments posted by them.

Like reddit.com, d3.ru has a concept of karma. There are also communities with opposite political views which leads to mutual downvotes in each other's karmas.

Let's take a look at how changed karmas of all users on d3.ru: The red lines ended up with negative karma and the green lines - positive.

You may notice a green mark around September 2016 - this is where users of one community organized to downvote users from the opposite community. The event was called "karmapulta" (karma + catapult).

Let's take a look at the downvoted community: As the mark below 0 is green, this shows how users of the downvoted community organized to upvote the downvoted users.
